testcase.name: prerequisite: parse-hook-events.js exists and is executable
prerequisite: formatter hook script exists
prerequisite: run-hook-test.sh harness exists
prerequisite: jq is available
formatter hook triggers on PostToolUse after Write tool
formatter hook triggers on PostToolUse after Edit tool
formatter hook does not trigger for Read operations
formatter hook output includes status field
formatter hook output includes formatted_file field
formatter hook reports successful completion
Python files (.py) map to ruff formatter
TypeScript files (.ts) map to prettier formatter
Go files (.go) map to gofmt formatter
unknown extension returns no_formatter status
multiple files in single session trigger multiple formatter events
summary correctly counts formatter hooks by event type
summary includes formatter in unique_hooks list
formatter hook script returns valid JSON output
formatter hook script includes hookEventName PostToolUse
formatter hook returns no_file when file path cannot be extracted
formatter hook returns file_not_found for missing files
formatter hook returns no_extension for files without extension
FORMATTER_HOOK_DISABLE=1 disables the hook
formatter hook handles files with multiple dots in name
formatter hook handles uppercase extensions
formatter hook handles paths with spaces
